title: What is the most inappropriate BTS song? - Quora

response.answer_text: “War of Hormone”, “August D”(Yoongi), “Expensive Girl” (Namjoon), “Joke” (Namjoon) and “Trouble” (Namjoon and Jin) are probably some of the most explicit. Not gonna lie I actually think all of these songs are a bop (yes even expensive girl) and I listen to them still to this day. So the first time I actually read the lyrics to “War of Hormone” (which was a long time after I had first heard it) I was pretty shocked lol. I’ll never forget Jungkook’s line where he goes “Girls are like equations and us guys just do them” and I was like oh ok cool. Like lmao it was so unexpected and I didn’t know how to react. Yeah, the song doesn’t have a great meaning behind it and they’re basically objectifying girls but this was a few years back where they didn’t have as much control over the music they sang. “Expensive Girl” was definitely the worst lmaoo I remember having to shut my laptop off and having to actually comprehend what the fuck I had just listened to, but honestly that song grew on me and I liked it adjakls. “Agust D” is a jam ok I know there’s all that “tongue technology” stuff but we live for that honestly, like you can tell Yoongs is really confident in his tongue, but doesn’t have every right to be lol. Oof ok, “Trouble” this song only kinda scarred me. Just a tad though. Joon takes the lead for most of the sexual references, Jin kinda just singing a long in the background but nonetheless he was still apart of it. That song is actually pretty good too so like it’s fine ahaha. “Joke” is like crazy. There’s a lot happening in that song, but it’s not really that bad besides the cussing (which I don’t mind at all). But he does rap about porn and stuff (for like 2 secs), so it is considered inappropriate. Ok, but all jokes aside these songs were made a while ago, especially “Expensive Girl”, “Trouble”, And “War of Hormone” so any new army please don’t try to bring up any questions about these songs, especially “Expensive Girl”. Idk it’d be super weird and uncomfortable for Namjoon if you ask him about it, it was awhile ago and he’s grown so much and knows so much more. Same goes for all of them, they’ve grown a tremendous amount and have really learned how to treat women. Like they don’t even give a full hug when hugging women because they think it’s disrespectful. Cut them some slack, please, Korea is not America and they’re still learning, don’t hold what stupid shit they say like three or four years ago against them.

OH i have a pretty unpopular opinion here, converse high is, in my opinion a REALLY dirty song. the vocal parts are alright, they’re pretty cute and sound like a normal boygroup song: “I'm so into your Converse Highs I can't help it, woah I'm so into your Converse Highs I like it so much, woah” alright, a little weird to be singing about shoes like that but considering namjoons love for converse at the time, it’s understandable. but then we get to the rap parts and it starts getting dirtier. Alright, red, orange, yellow, green, blue, violet The rainbow on your feet is shot like Rambo It aims at me, bang bang, shout out wow wow Together with your body makes me go hakhak Super-taxi, super-cycle, super-subway No, thanks, I wanna ride the super-bus Rather than the stars in the sky I wanna see the stars on your shoes Haha, without Namjoon knowing okay, now this is where it gets a bit weird. in Korean, the hakhak sound effect is more like a bangbang. so when he says when i’m with your body i go bangbang without namjoon knowing, so he’s basically talking about um. doing unholy things to namjoon’s girl without him knowing. Converse, Converse, I really hate a Converse When you look flashy with your black stockings And your high heels. That's just a lie But you look better with Jordan numbers Ha don't you know? Converses kill your charm Anyway when you meet me, don't wear Converses It's too hard to take them off of you do i even have to explain? yoongi’s talking about taking clothes off this converse-wearing girl to do. things. bts had tons of rlly strange songs like that, but they’re also lyrical geniuses and that’s important to remember hahaha
